    • Constructor Detail

      • EntityManager

        public EntityManager(SoundManager soundManager,
                     Main main,
                     Scenes scenes)
        Constructor for EntityManager.
        Parameters:
        soundManager - The SoundManager class being used to manage all of the sound of the game.
        main - The Main class that is running the program and is the entry point for starting and playing the game.
        scenes - The various screens that are seen throughout playing the game, such as the main menu, the settings menu, the win screen, etc.

    • Method Detail

      • playerAttack

        public void playerAttack()
        This method is called from the MouseEventHandler when the left BUTTON is pressed. It checks if there are any zombies in the player's hitbox (120 degrees) and if so, it calls the playerHitsZombie method.

      • pastCreatureAttack

        public void pastCreatureAttack()
        This method is called when the past creature is in attack mode. It checks if there are any zombies in the past creature's hitbox (120 degrees) and if so, it calls the pastCreatureHitsZombie() method. At the end it calls removeDeletedZombies()

      • freezeZombies

        public void freezeZombies()

      • playerPush

        public void playerPush()
        This method is called from the KeyBoardEventHandler when 'Space' is pressed. It checks if there are any zombies near the player, if so the zombie is pushed aside.

      • computeSoundBalance

        public double computeSoundBalance(Zombie zombie)
        Parameters:
        zombie - Zombie within hearing distance of player.
        Returns:
        number from -1 to 1 that represents balance

      • createZombies

        public void createZombies(Tile[][] gameBoard,
                          int zHeight,
                          int xWidth,
                          boolean continuingLevel)
        Creates list of all of the zombies that will spawn on the board.

      • startMasterZombie

        public void startMasterZombie()
        When a zombie detects the player, the master zombie also detects the player and goes after the player.

      • restartZombies

        public void restartZombies()

      • tick

        public void tick()
        This Method updates all the values of all entities

      • setZombieHouse3d

        public void setZombieHouse3d(ZombieHouse3d zombieHouse)
        Parameters:
        zombieHouse - ZombieHouse3d Object This Method sets the the current instance of zombieHouse3d with the parameter zombieHouse

      • destroyZombieHouse

        public void destroyZombieHouse()
        Disposes of the Zombie House elements.

      • resetEM

        public void resetEM()
        Resets the entity manager for a new playthrough of the same map
